entry.title: Super Construct World
entry.summary: Super Construct World is the first game in the Super Construct Bros.
entry.content:
Super Construct World is the first game in the Super Construct Bros. series, a Mario fangame series built in the fanmade level editor Super Mario Construct.

There are 8 worlds, 2 of them being special. You can play through in intended order or freely across the levels. There are 30 levels in total.

It also has some inside jokes...

More levels coming soon! Leave a comment of your level code if you'd like it included.

Table of Contents

  • W1: Goldenkiwi Beach

W1: Goldenkiwi Beach

A beautiful beach filled with kiwis of all kinds. Yet it appears Boom Boom has established an airship here, glooming the skies over the coast.
